1.content:
Millions buzz around the streets and skyways of the paradise planets. Each with their own duties, travelling in and out of biodomes in service to what ever master beckoned them.

The golden skies of the outside world are rarely seen by those for whom the planet was designed. Instead the masters of this world are those who wallow in such luxury that they embrace the swelling of their size. Her the fat rule and the bigger and fatter you are the more influence you have.

You are fortunate enough to have a glimpse into this world. The question is are you at the top of the food chain or the bottom?
1.title: Welcome to Girtha Seven

11.content:
In a rare moment without food you find yourself pondering on your next meal, groping at your bulging body. Thoughts of your size only serve to make you hungry again. Before you bellow your servants you look to you mirror glimpsing you enormous body. You are....

Imbundan - a monumental, pure blooded, female Girthian. You are an insatiable goddess, considered to be large even among your race. A massive bulging belly is your prized feature, which is kept full and round. However, many have complimented on you many chins or how your thick cheeks frame your button nose and violet eyes. You favour humans as your servants, enjoying how tiny they are to you immense form.

Srim- a gargantuan Slog female that has been elevated to the rank of Girthian. She is barely able to move, you have embraced your lavished lifestyle. Enjoying the high life, gorging, sleeping and embracing other pleasures. You are born of a royal line, and you always get what you desire.

Surry- a bottom heavy Hipolian. A mane of blond locks flow down your back, your pride and joy. You enjoy the sedate lifestyle, filling your massive maw with culinary delights. You are well known as a party animal in Girthian social circles.

Izzy - an immense human woman. Chocolate brown skin, stretched to its limit (and then some). You have undergone many adaptive enhancements (both mechanical and bioengineered), to cope with your races limited capabilities. You are a mass of fat, barely able to move. Despite being an immobile mass, you seek to grow even more.
11.title: Girthian

12.content:
You lie on a pile of cushions, dotted on my a small army of loyal servants. Each bustle around you, performing an assortment of tasks. Feeding you, massaging you, prepping your next meal are all examples of their potential tasks. There is not an idle hand in the room.

Scarlet - Caucasian human female. although you are a natural red head, you have dyed your hair to a much more vibrant shade. You weigh approximately 800lbs and are completely immobile. Girthian medication has kept you health, but you seek further bio-enhancements to grow beyond the limitations of your species.

Loppil- a Hipolion female. You are naturally large, even among your species. So achieving your current rank on Girthia has been relatively easy. However, you want more of the easy life and to do that you need to gain more. You are approximately 600lbs.

Losh’k - Slogg female. You are about on par with many other sloggs on the planet. You enjoy you size and status, but what you really want is someone special. The only thing you want is to find someone who loves you. You hope that increasing your size will bring more potential partners to your side. You weigh a whopping 900lbs.

Ss’ill - a Serpile female. You came to the planet as a muscular bulk of muscle in the servant class. But you caught the eye of the right people and gained a tremendous amount of fat as well. You are hooked on the gain. You are curious to see how this weight gain thing turns out. At the moment you are 550lbs.
12.title: Upper Segment

13.content:
You are sat upon your most comfortable seat, a loungex 4K. Your face is being crammed full of dainty snacks by a near by servent. What few other servents you have are busy performing other tasks around your appartment. You admire your bloated form in the mirror. You are:

Cassy - a pampered human noble. With your pale skin and raven black hair you were considered to be quite the catch in certain social circles. There was only one problem, you family wanted to keep you thin. Cutting ties you left your home and worked your way up from service class. You wish to live a hedonistic life style and gain as much as possible.

Sorl - a young, female slog. You are a bloated new arrival seeking to grow to immense proportions. Hopefully you can find some loyal servents to help with your goal.

Devora - A female serpile. Equal parts fat and muscle, all gains are good gains to you. Unlike many you don't want to stay sedatory. Instead you excersize as much as you eat.

Ebon - A female Hipolian newcomer. Before coming to Githa you were already quite fat. But now with a small team at your call you can get as big as you like.
13.title: Lower Segment

14.content:
You are giddy with excitement. You have been approved for the Girthian Seven service class. You are giddy with excitement to serve someone truly godlike in their hugeness.

You are:

Fin - a human male. Caucasian, with ginger hair and a fairly average build. You are bisexual and are eager to serve whoever will take you. Your dream is to serve the largest being on the planet.

Nik’t - a lanky Slog male who seeks a goddess to dedicate his life to. Being a member of the service class has always been your dream. You have vowed eternal loyalty to whatever being adopts you.

Nikki - female human with an Asian heritage. You are petite and slender. You have spent your life hiding your attraction to larger people and want explore your new sexual dimensions on Girtha Seven.

Croke- a muscular serpile male. You are an avid body builder. You want to use you sheer mass of muscles to the best of your abilities in service to the biggest of the big.
14.title: Service Class

15.content:
You have been travelling in a dark container. It’s cramped with others, fellow prisoners mag-manacled in a standing position. Turbulence kicked in, you are now entering an atmosphere. You gulp, a sentence on Girtha Seven is to live out your life in service to some “gross blob”.

You gulp, mentally preparing yourself for processing. Hopefully, you new master will be merciful.

Crik- a slog male, sentenced to Girtha as a correctional sentence. You refused to worship any remotely gelatinous being. As a result you offended a slog noble woman.

John - human male, 5ft, slim figure, brown hair with green eyes. You are a notorious thief and con man. Your good luck and silver tongue has only got you so far. You are hoping this sentence will be much easier that the supermax you coerced yourself out of. Only time will tell.

Ssarc- serpile female, 8ft tall with a muscular build. You are a member of a notorious gang of space pirates. Traditional prisons have had an issue holding you. Will Girtha Seven be any different.

Hork- 5ft tall, Hipolian male. Compared to others of your race you are quite scrawny. You worked in the accounting sector on your home planet. However, you were framed and accused of fraud. Your sentence merely gets you out of the way.
15.title: Prisoner Class

info.brief_description: Take on the role of one of the residents of this strange planet.

Girtha Seven is an enormous planet where size is everything. The bigger you are the more influence you have. Pick your character and live your life among an alien world where big is everything.
